page.title: 03Modern Recreation Complex
page.content: Park House Of vital importance to the area,for Tourism and from seventh of july 1985 recreational facilities,is that of an hotel called Park House Hotel. Situated just off the Tenby to New Hedges road lies a completely modernised building,originally being as a mansion.Lying in 34 acres of it's own land,it was bought by the Parkers in 1968 and has now been built up into one of the foremost hotels in West Wales. It caters for 250 people with the emphasis on family holidays.Of great importance is the allowance on the ground floor for the Physically Handicapped people.Cuisene is excellent with all types of menues.
